remarks: Right angles are preserved by motions.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Dec-2019.)
statement:
israg.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
israg.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
israg.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
israg.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
israg.s $e |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) $.
israg.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
israg.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
israg.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
israg.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
motrag.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( G Ismt G ) ) $.
motrag.1 $e |- ( ph -> <" A B C "> e. ( raG ` G ) ) $.
motrag $p |- ( ph -> <" ( F ` A ) ( F ` B ) ( F ` C ) "> e. ( raG ` G ) ) $.
